alert.note: Alert for Bordeaux, Chugwater, Wheatland; Goshen, Middle-Lower North Platte River Basin; Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 02 at 1:47AM MDT until November 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FOR TODAY NOON TO 6 PM FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM MDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 417...418 and 432 through 436. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 12 to 15 percent this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop may spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
